original_title: Government Aims To Provide A Home For Every Citizen
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st);Deputy Minister of Housing T.B. Sarath says that the government's goal is to provide a house to every person.He stated this while participating in the World Habitat Day celebrations held at Temple Trees this morning.It was held under the patronage of President Anura Kumara Dissanayake.
